attributes.action: penalise the motorist who does not indicate at roundabouts,junctions,etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this suggestion will reduce carbon 
emmissions,reduce traffic congestion,
reduce road rage etc.etc.ask yourself
how much time is wasted on a daily basis   
throughout great britain with drivers 
not using their indicators.a penalty
should be imposed on these so-called
drivers, and it may contribute to us 
all being more considerate and better
DRIVERS!
